text: Need Aria Perez for Betty's Burgers campaign. Budget around $6,915, looking for 1 x Professional headshots, 2 x 2-minute tutorial, 1 x Instagram post, 1 x Podcast guest. 6 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 5 months. Need to confirm: usage rights
